name: CQ.form.ClearableComboBox
doc:
The ClearableComboBox is a non-editable combo box with a trigger to clear
its value.

events.name: added
events.doc: Fires when a component is added to an CQ.Ext.Container

events.doc:

events.doc:
Fires when the autoSize function is triggered. The field may or

events.name: beforedestroy
events.doc: Fires before the component is destroyed. Return false from an event handler to stop the destroy.

events.doc:
Fires before the component is hidden by calling the hide method.

events.name: beforeloadcontent
events.doc: Fires before the content is loaded. Return false to cancel loading content.

events.doc:
Fires before all queries are processed. Return false to cancel the query or set the queryEvent's
...

events.name: beforerender
events.doc:
Fires before the component is rendered. Return false from an
event handler to stop the render.

events.name: beforeselect
events.doc: Fires before a list item is selected. Return false to cancel the selection.

events.name: beforeshow
events.doc:
Fires before the component is shown by calling the show method.

events.doc: Fires before the state of the component is saved to the configured state provider. Return false t...

events.name: blur
events.doc: Fires when this field loses input focus.

events.name: change
events.doc: Fires just before the field blurs if the field value has changed.

events.name: collapse
events.doc: Fires when the dropdown list is collapsed

events.name: destroy
events.doc: Fires after the component is destroyed.

events.name: disable
events.doc: Fires after the component is disabled.

events.name: enable
events.doc: Fires after the component is enabled.

events.name: expand
events.doc: Fires when the dropdown list is expanded

events.name: focus
events.doc: Fires when this field receives input focus.

events.name: hide
events.doc:
Fires after the component is hidden.
Fires after the component is hidden when calling the hide me...

events.name: invalid
events.doc: Fires after the field has been marked as invalid.

events.name: keydown
events.doc:
Keydown input field event. This event only fires if enableKeyEvents
is set to true.

events.name: keypress
events.doc:
Keypress input field event. This event only fires if enableKeyEvents
is set to true.

events.name: keyup
events.doc:
Keyup input field event. This event only fires if enableKeyEvents
is set to true.

events.name: loadcontent
events.doc: Fires when the content has been loaded.

events.name: move
events.doc: Fires after the component is moved.

events.name: removed
events.doc: Fires when a component is removed from an CQ.Ext.Container

events.name: render
events.doc: Fires after the component markup is rendered.

events.name: resize
events.doc: Fires after the component is resized.

events.name: select
events.doc: Fires when a list item is selected

events.name: show
events.doc: Fires after the component is shown when calling the show method.

events.name: specialkey
events.doc:
Fires when any key related to navigation (arrows, tab, enter, esc, etc.) is pressed.

events.name: staterestore
events.doc: Fires after the state of the component is restored.

events.name: statesave
events.doc: Fires after the state of the component is saved to the configured state provider.

events.name: valid
events.doc: Fires after the field has been validated with no errors.
